::Zardus::

Zardus emerges from the CR chamber. He was not wounded, just 
tranformation-locked, so the CR chamber did not take too long.

"Zardus, TRAMSFORM!!"

Zardus transforms into his robot mode, activating his comm-link.

"Nemesis," he says into it, "Has the spark been prepared?"
